trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que uma propriedade anexada é navegável apenas em elementos que derivam de um tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: O significado do termo `browsable` como usado nas descrições para este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] é análogo às descrições fornecidas para <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, mas o estado navegável de uma propriedade anexada é particularmente relevante para informações de propriedade de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], porque uma propriedade anexada é principalmente um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] conceito.

trans-unit.source: If more than one type is specified for a <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or).
trans-unit.target: Se mais de um tipo for especificado para um <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], a propriedade é navegável se algum especificado correspondências de tipo (lógico ou).

trans-unit.source: The type can also be an interface.
trans-unit.target: O tipo também pode ser uma interface.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.
trans-unit.target: Isso [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] especifica <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: Isso [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] só deve ser aplicada no acessador get de definições de propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: Não se aplicam a esse [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] para o acessador set.

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: Embora intuitivamente é a operação de conjunto que está sendo feita navegável para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] nos elementos relevantes, é a presença e as características do acessador get na propriedade de definição de elemento que controla o comportamento de true.

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre propriedades anexadas declarativa, consulte [visão geral de propriedades anexado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The intended type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: O tipo desejado que tem como escopo o uso da propriedade anexada em que este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> class, using the provided <paramref name="targetType" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> usando o <paramref name="targetType" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] atual é igual a um objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> especificado for igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação oferece suporte a igualdade de valor do possíveis definível pelo valor exposto por este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An unsigned 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro de 32 bits sem sinal.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação oferece suporte a vários valores de hash possíveis com base em possíveis definível pelo valor exposto por este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo base que tem como escopo o uso da propriedade anexada em que este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The requested <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> solicitado.

trans-unit.source: This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é configurável apenas via o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaração como expostos pelo <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique type identifier for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um identificador de tipo exclusivo para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An object that is a unique identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é um identificador exclusivo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação retorna um valor exclusivo para cada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], que é necessário porque isso [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] permite que vários usos.
